text: tae anak( mou ham meat) min bankheunh te ryy? puok( poutatbot) del aahang tha puokke pitchea ban chue champoh avei del a l laoh ban banhchouh aoy anak ning avei del trong ban banhchouh pimoun anak daoy puokke mean bamnng chngaoy t hkou t katsechakdei aoy del a l laoh ban banhchea puokke min aoy chue vea laey . haey shai t n mean bamnng chng thveu aoy puokke v nge vng del chea kar v nge v ng muoy da sen chhngay
